name: Interstellar Scum
description:
An entry into the June 2019 libGDX Jam.

You are the captain of a spacecraft, but something is not right. The SCUM parasite has made it's way past quarantine and it's up to you to determine who is the infected Host...

Based on the famous party game Mafia. Each crew member has a role to play in each game which determines who they accuse and how they vote in the secret ballot. If left unchecked, the parasite hosts will infect another crew member between each lightspeed jump. You main goal will be to determine these roles and figure out a way to suss out the culprits. You will fail many times.

"Music by Devynn LaShure, Echo Blue Music

https://www.echobluemusic.com"
